Name: Blanche Corpse Reviver
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Blanche absinthe sits surprisingly well in this riff on the classic Corpse Reviver.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2013 by Stephen Quainton at B.Y.O.C. Bar in Brighton, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Blanche Corpse Reviver contains 198 calories
